title: Featured tab
custom_preconds:
Given user an iPhone with latest MLB app installed
AND user is signed in with SVOD-entitled account

custom_steps_separated.content: When user navs to the MLB.TV EPG via the TV icon
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then user is able to see the "Featured" tab in the segmented control of the MLB.TV EPG

custom_steps_separated.content: When user taps to play any SVOD content from the "Featured" tab
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then user is successfully able to playback SVOD content

custom_steps_separated.content: When user has Spanish language set for Device Settings
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the 'Featured' tab should be in Spanish version 'Destacados'

custom_steps_separated.content: When a user scrolls down the "Featured" tab section
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then user able to scroll down to all the way down for viewing list of contents in "Featured" tab 
AND scrolling up or down should be smooth

custom_steps_separated.content: When a user examines the contents of a video thumbnail
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the thumbnail will contain a title in white bolded font
and the time stamp will be below the the title
and will contain an info button in the top right corner
and all text present will be clear and legible

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the user is playing SVOD content 
and dismisses video playback using X button
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then user lands back on "Featured" tab

title: Standard Video Player
custom_preconds:
Given user an iPhone with latest MLB app installed on device
and is logged in with an SVOD-entitled account

custom_steps_separated.content: When the entitled user taps to play SVOD content
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then playback of video plays through the standard video player

custom_steps_separated.content: When user viewing/playing SVOD content
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then playback should be smooth AND there will be no crashes

custom_steps_separated.content: When a user plays a video in landscape mode and taps on the screen
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the video controller UI will appear onscreen with the following:

Top Overlay: X button, Title, AirPlay, Chromecast,  Play/Pause, Elapsed (M:SS), Scrubber, Remaining (M:SS), Toggle Full Screen(if applicable)

custom_steps_separated.content: When a user is connected to the same network as a Chromecast and then plays a video then taps the screen
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user will see a Chromecast icon on the top overlay of the video controller

custom_steps_separated.content: When a user is playing a inline video and then holds down the dot on the scrubber
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the video will stop
and the Play button will turn to a Pause button
and the user is able to move the scrubber back and forward

custom_steps_separated.content:
When On WIFI connection, when a user taps on a video thumbnail

AND On Carrier connection, when a user taps on a video thumbnail
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the video playback for the selected SVOD will begin

title: Minutes Streamed
custom_preconds:
Given user an iPhone with latest MLB app installed on device
and the user is logged in with SVOD-entitled account
custom_steps: When the user launches SVOD content
custom_expected: Then the video player should display the minutes streamed in the player controls

title: Content Metadata
custom_preconds: Given user an iPhone with latest MLB app installed on device

custom_steps_separated.content: When navigate to SVOD content
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then each content item will have metadata such as a title, description, thumbnail and duration.

custom_steps_separated.content: When user view the content title
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the content title will display in white text on the thumbnail

custom_steps_separated.content: When user view the duration time of the content
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the duration time will be displayed as MM:SS
below the content title

custom_steps_separated.content: When user taps the "i" in the top right corner of the thumbnail
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then content description should display for the title

title: Anonymous In-App Purchase user
custom_preconds:
Given user an iPhone with latest MLB app installed on device
AND user is in the app as an Anonymous IAP user
custom_steps: When the user taps to launch a video from the Featured tab
custom_expected: Then the video should start playback

title: MLB Audio
custom_preconds:
Given user an iPhone with latest MLB app installed on device
AND user signed in with MLB Audio account
custom_steps: When the user taps to launch a video from the Featured tab
custom_expected: Then the user will see the TV paywall

title: MLBALL
custom_preconds:
Given user an iPhone with latest MLB app installed on device
AND user signed in with MLBALL account
custom_steps: When the user taps to launch a video from the Featured tab
custom_expected: Then the video should start playback

title: Single Team
custom_preconds:
Given user an iPhone with latest MLB app installed on device
AND user signed in with Single Team subscriber account
custom_steps: When the user taps to launch a video from the Featured tab
custom_expected: Then the video should start playback

title: Free users
custom_preconds:
Given user an iPhone with latest MLB app installed on device
AND user is not logged in with any account or entitlements
custom_steps: When the user taps to launch a video from the Featured tab
custom_expected: Then the user will see the TV paywall

title: Standard Video Player
custom_preconds:
Given user an iPhone with latest MLB app installed on device
and is logged in with an SVOD-entitled account

custom_steps_separated.content: When the entitled user taps to play SVOD content
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then playback of video plays through the standard video player

custom_steps_separated.content: When user viewing/playing SVOD content
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then playback should be smooth AND there will be no crashes

custom_steps_separated.content: When a user plays a video in full screen mode in landscape mode and taps on the screen
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the video controller UI will appear onscreen with the following:

Top Overlay: X button, Title, AirPlay, Chromecast, Play/Pause, Elapsed (M:SS), Scrubber, Remaining (M:SS), Toggle Full Screen(if applicable)

custom_steps_separated.content: When a user plays a video in full screen mode in portrait mode and taps on the screen
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the video controller UI will appear onscreen with the following:

Top Overlay: X button, Title, AirPlay, Chromecast, Play/Pause, Elapsed (M:SS), Scrubber, Remaining (M:SS), Toggle Full Screen(if applicable)

custom_steps_separated.content: When a user is connected to the same network as a Chromecast and then plays a video then taps the screen
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user will see a Chromecast icon on the top overlay of the video controller

custom_steps_separated.content: When a user is playing a video and then holds down the dot on the scrubber
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the video will stop
and the Play button will turn to a Pause button
and the user is able to move the scrubber back and forward

custom_steps_separated.content: When On WIFI connection, when a user taps on a video thumbnail
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the video playback for the selected SVOD will begin

custom_steps_separated.content: When a user plays a video and turns the iPad landscape or Portrait mode
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the SVOD content will play in Full screen mode and player control should display
